mapper.sql: select cl.id, cl.template_id, cl.user_id, cl.name, cl.id_card, cl.address, cl.main_content, cl.image, cl.create_time, cl.update_time, cl.delete_time, cl.weigh, cl.sign_status, cl.sign_date, cl.delete_flag, m.id m_id, m.username m_username, m.nickname m_nickname, -- m.password m_password, m.salt m_salt, m.mobile m_mobile, -- m.avatar m_avatar, m.successions m_successions, m.max_successions m_max_successions, m.prev_time m_prev_time, m.login_time m_login_time, -- m.login_ip m_login_ip, -- m.payment_code m_payment_code, -- m.join_ip m_join_ip, m.join_time m_join_time, m.create_time m_create_time, m.update_time m_update_time, m.status m_status, m.balance m_balance, m.superior_name m_superior_name, m.superior_code m_superior_code, m.superior_id m_superior_id, m.institution_number m_institution_number, m.daili_id m_daili_id, m.jingzhijiaoyi m_jingzhijiaoyi, m.is_pz m_is_pz, m.is_dz m_is_dz, m.is_ps m_is_ps, m.is_sg m_is_sg, m.is_zs m_is_zs, m.is_qc m_is_qc, m.is_qh m_is_qh, m.is_inform m_is_inform, m.freeze_profit m_freeze_profit, m.weiyima m_weiyima, m.name m_name, m.id_card m_id_card, m.submit_auth_time m_submit_auth_time, m.auth_time m_auth_time, m.is_auth m_is_auth, m.auth_reject_reason m_auth_reject_reason, m.auth_reject_time m_auth_reject_time, m.deposit_bank m_deposit_bank, m.khzhihang m_khzhihang, m.account_name m_account_name, m.account m_account, -- m.card_image m_card_image, m.binding_time m_binding_time, m.unbind_time m_unbind_time, m.delete_flag m_delete_flag, m.bank_card_auth m_bank_card_auth, m.withdraw_switch m_withdraw_switch from fa_contract_list cl left join fa_member m on cl.user_id = m.id
mapper.insert:
insert into fa_contract_list
template_id, user_id, name, id_card, address, main_content, image, create_time, update_time, delete_time, weigh, sign_status, sign_date, delete_flag,
#{templateId}, #{userId}, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{address}, #{mainContent}, #{image}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteTime}, #{weigh}, #{signStatus}, #{signDate}, #{deleteFlag},
mapper.delete: update fa_contract_list set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}

update fa_contract_list set delete_flag = 1 where id in
#{id}
